name: Bookme – Free Online Appointment Booking and Scheduling Plugin
author: Bylancer

sections.description:
Bookme is a powerful easy-to-use and easy-to-manage free booking and scheduling tool for service providers. Bookme supports a wide range of services provided by business, individuals (like institute, clinic, spas and more) who offer reservations through websites. With this employee scheduling software, you can set up any reservation online quickly, pleasantly and easily.

With Bookme you can manage your online appointments 24/7. You can start your business easily with the free version of Bookme. And if you want more advanced features than this free version then you can check the Bookme full version here

KEY FEATURES:

  • Fully Responsive Front-End Design
  • Intuitive and Powerful Admin Panel
  • Simple WordPress integration with shortcode
  • Multipurpose booking (service booking, consultant booking, group booking all in one package)
  • Add Multiple Booking forms as your need
  • Show or hide any field of the booking form
  • Customize everything of the booking form including headings, texts and buttons
  • Configurable schedules and days-off
  • Email Templates – Editable e-mail notifications
  • Multi-User Functionality
  • Unlimited Number of Customers
  • Customers and Payment Management
  • Unlimited colors and lots of customization options
  • Translatable Ready
  • WPML integration for multi-language support

PLEASE NOTE unlimited services and staff members, online payment, SMS notification, cart system, custom fields, Google calendar integration, woocommerce payment and many advanced features are NOT AVAILABLE in the free version. If you want all this advanced features then check the Bookme full version here.

Who can use it?

  • Customer scheduling (beauty salons, massage, spas, massage therapists and health care reservations)
  • Training scheduling (sports, training, dance, fitness, yoga appointments)
  • Education scheduling (learning and educational courses, tutors and helpers)
  • Patient scheduling (doctor, dentists, clinic, medical)
  • Meeting scheduling (coaching, phone advice)
  • Equipment rentals (cars, bikes, computers, technical equipment, pools, etc.)
  • Or any other service which can be scheduled online using booking system.

Bookme Full Version Features

Bookme full version provide you many more advanced features and customization with 6 months of free customer support and free life time updates.

  • Unlimited number of services with more advanced settings (padding time, limitation, staff member preference etc.)
  • Unlimited number of staff members
  • 6+ payment gateways for accepting online payments on your website
  • SMS notifications
  • Google Calendar integration
  • WooCommerce payment compatibility
  • Cart Feature – Allow your customers to book multiple services at once
  • Custom Fields – Create many custom fields in the booking form for extra details
  • Discount Coupon – Give discount to your customer with a coupon code
  • Export booking data.
  • And many more.

FURTHER READING

  • Full Version Demo
  • Buy Full Version
  • Documentation
  • Support Team and Pre-sale Questions
sections.installation:
MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS

  • WordPress 4.5 or greater
  • PHP version 5.3.7 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

AUTOMATIC INSTALLATION

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t even need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Bookme, log in to your WordPress admin panel, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Bookme” and click Search Plugins. Once you have found our plugin, you can install it simply by clicking Install Now. WordPress will automatically complete the installation.

MANUAL INSTALLATION

The manual installation method involves downloading our plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application.

  1. Download the plugin file to your computer and unzip it.
  2. Using an FTP program, or your hosting control panel, upload the unzipped plugin folder to your WordPress installations wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin in the WordPress sidebar menu –> Plugins.
sections.faq:
Where can I find the documentation?

You can check the documentation here.

Where can I test the Bookme full version?

To check the all features of Bookme full version, check the demo here.

How to upgrade to Bookme full version?

Purchase and download the full version from here and install it as a new plugin.

I installed this plugin. How do I get it running?

First create at least one staff and service, and go to the Posts/Pages and click on the button “Add Bookme Booking Form”.

short_description: Bookme is a modern, multipurpose and fully customizable WordPress appointment booking plugin for accepting online appointments bookings & scheduling.
